selrach.bnetbuilder.data.interfaces
Interface DataAccessor

All Superinterfaces:
StateUpdatedListener, VariableUpdatedListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
FileAccessor
public interface DataAccessor
extends VariableUpdatedListener, StateUpdatedListener

This is intended to facilitate multiple types of data sources towards a standard parsing format for the system

Author:
Charles Robertson

Method Summary

          Gets a text description of the datasource, useful for humans
